name: 1. Vibrant Studio Appartment
description:
🪟 Bright & Airy: Well-ventilated room with ample natural sunlight and cooling breeze—perfect for summers.
🚿 Attached Washroom: Comes with a clean, private in-room washroom for added comfort.
 🧑‍🍳 Private Kitchen Setup: Includes a dedicated kitchen area for convenient cooking.
🛏️ Spacious & Furnished: Fully furnished with a bed, study table, and chair—ideal for both comfort and productivity.
📶 High-Speed WiFi: Seamless internet access for work or entertainment.
💧 Water Purifier: Clean drinking water available at all times.
🎥 24x7 CCTV Surveillance: Constant security monitoring for peace of mind.
🌇 Safe Neighbourhood: Located in a secure and friendly locality.
🔌 Power Backup: Uninterrupted electricity with reliable backup support.
🪣 Utility Aangan: Designated space for washing utensils and drying clothes.

name: 2. Spacious 1 RK Studio Appartment
description:
🛏️ Spacious & Comfortable: A well-sized room that stays naturally cool during summers—ideal for a single student.
🌿 Garden-Facing: Opens up to a lush garden view with excellent ventilation.
🪑 Fully Furnished: Comes with a bed, study table, chair, and cupboard for daily comfort.
🚿 Private Washroom: Separate, clean in-room bathroom for personal use.
🍽️ Private Kitchen: Dedicated in-room kitchen space for your convenience.
💧 Water Purifier: Safe and clean drinking water provided.
⚡ 24x7 Utilities: Uninterrupted water and electricity supply ensured.
🍱 Food Not Included: No in-house food, but plenty of tiffin services to choose from.
🪣 Utility Aangan: Designated space for washing utensils and drying clothes.

name: 3. Budget Friendly Compact Room
description:
🛏️ Cozy and Comfortable: Perfectly sized for a single student or working professional.
🚿 Attached Washroom: Comes with a private, in-room washroom for convenience.
🍽️ Common Kitchen Access: While there's no private kitchen, a fully equipped shared kitchen is available for use.
🪣 Utility Aangan: Includes a designated aangan area for washing utensils and drying clothes.
🍱 Food Not Included: No in-house food, but plenty of tiffin services to choose from.
🪣 Utility Aangan: Designated space for washing utensils and drying clothes.

name: 4. Compact Cozy Budget Friendly Room
description:
🛏️ Compact & Efficient: A small yet functional room, perfect for a single student.
🌿 Garden-Facing: Opens up to a lush garden view with excellent ventilation.
🪑 Fully Furnished: Comes with a bed, study table, chair, and cupboard for daily comfort.
🚿 Common Washroom: Clean and accessible shared bathroom facilities.
🍽️ Common Kitchen: Shared kitchen space available for your cooking needs.
💧 Water Purifier: Safe and clean drinking water provided.
⚡ 24x7 Utilities: Uninterrupted water and electricity supply ensured.
🍱 Food Not Included: No in-house food, but plenty of tiffin services to choose from.
🪣 Utility Aangan: Designated space for washing utensils and drying clothes.
